definition: Get well soon!/to recover health quickly
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: However, I wish he could recover for the World Cup, "he added."
sentences.chinese: 不過，我祝願他能早日康復並參加世界盃。

sentences.english: B:I hope your grandfather will recover soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你爺爺早日康復。

sentences.english: We hope he will get better soon.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望他能早日康復。

sentences.english: I just wanted to check on you and tell you to get well soon.
sentences.chinese: 我只是念挨德律風問候你，而且祝你早日康復。

sentences.english: Are you feeling ill? hope you get well soon.
sentences.chinese: 你生病了嗎？希望你早日康復。

sentences.english: I love you, Dear Mom and Dad.
sentences.chinese: 望媽媽早日康復，爸爸身體健康。

sentences.english: I hope you can forgive me and please accept my best wishes for a speedy recovery hoppy.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能原諒我並接受我最誠摯的祝福，祝早日康復。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that you will soon be restored to health.
sentences.chinese: 我們衷心希望你早日康復。

sentences.english: He appreciates the call and tells you to get well soon.
sentences.chinese: 老闆謝謝您的來電，並且希望您能早日康復。

sentences.english: Early detection and treatment of a chylothorax can result the patient having an early recovery.
sentences.chinese: 早期查覺乳糜胸逕行治療，使得病人早日康復。

sentences.english: I hope you will be well pretty soon.
I wish you get well soon.
I sincerely hope you will soon recover.
sentences.chinese: 我誠懇地盼望你早日康復。

sentences.english: The housekeeping section sent me beautiful flowers and get well wishes.
sentences.chinese: 管家部送給我鮮花和祝願我早日康復。

definition: to inflate/to pump up/fig. to encourage/to boost morale
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
to get better/to improve/to get well
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to recuperate/to convalesce/to take care of one's health after illness
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
